channel.title: Public netherwart farm
channel.description:
I've managed to find some netherwart in a fortress and I have created a farm for everyone to use at X:123, Y: 35, Z:226. Please replant and only harvest fully grown netherwart as the immature warts only give you 1 back. I have around a stack or so planted and plan on making a bigger farm. It only grows in the nether on soul-sand.
Breaking a full grown Nether Wart yields 2 to 5 Nether Wart seeds. Breaking it before it's fully grown yields only a single seed.
Because Nether Wart grows rather slowly, large farms are recommended to maintain an abundant supply.
So please take some and make more farms and spread the love.
